scripts.dev: BUILD_ENVIRONMENT=${BUILD_ENVIRONMENT:-development} NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development --config config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build: BUILD_ENVIRONMENT=${BUILD_ENVIRONMENT:-production} NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.preview: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' NODE_ENV=production webpack serve --mode production --config config/webpack.config.ts
